full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Request for Proposal (RFP) for Handheld Positioning and Tracking Devices (GPS)

## Introduction
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of Handheld Positioning and Tracking Devices (GPS). The acquisition includes the delivery of goods, technical documentation, and a warranty period.

## Tender Details

*   **Tender Title:** W0106-22W638 Handheld Positioning and Tracking Devices (GPS)
*   **Tender Number:** WS3873785347
*   **Publication Date:** April 24, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** May 25, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT
*   **Location:** Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada

## Procurement Information

*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

## Categories Set-Aside (Conditional)

*   **Non-Indigenous Firms:** This procurement is open to non-Indigenous firms.
*   **Indigenous Firms:** If 2 or more Indigenous firms submit a responsive bid, the procurement will be set aside under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB), and only Indigenous firms will be assessed.

## Required Documents and Submission

*   All required supporting documents and bid submissions must be submitted by the closing date and time.

## Contact Information
*   **Name:** Oscar Delgado Garcia (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email:** [oscar.delgadogarcia@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:oscar.delgadogarcia@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Additional Resources
